backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the SidebarNav first menu item label was changed from 'Fan Controller Dashboard' to 'Dashboard' with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, styling, and key functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based design tokens for a dark purple/violet theme with success, warning, chart, and sidebar color variants for both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the BLDC Fan Dashboard app, mounting the React app at the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing view state and rendering one of six pages (Dashboard, Fans, Energy, Selection, Schedules, Settings) via a switch statement with a typed CurrentView union.
frontend/src/components/fans/FanControlM: Modal dialog for controlling an individual fan's power and speed, with gradient header, status blocks using chart color tokens, and preset speed buttons.
frontend/src/components/fans/FanListTabl: Table component listing fans with gradient header, colorful speed progress bars, status indicators, and power toggle buttons with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Layout wrapper component rendering a sidebar and main content area with a subtle gradient background.
frontend/src/components/nav/SidebarNav.t: Left sidebar navigation component with six menu items—first labeled 'Dashboard'—using typed CurrentView, gradient header, active state styling, and a footer attribution link.
frontend/src/components/schedules/Delete: Confirmation dialog for deleting a schedule, displaying fan and time details with destructive styling using shadcn/ui AlertDialog.
frontend/src/components/schedules/Schedu: A modal form component for creating or editing fan schedules, allowing users to select a fan, set a time, choose days of the week, and pick an action (power-on, power-off, or set-speed).
A table component that displays all configured schedules with fan info, time, days, action, and enabled status, plus edit/delete controls and a toggle switch.
frontend/src/data/mockFans.ts: Defines mock fan data and utility functions for filtering, aggregating, and retrieving fans by ID, room, or status.
frontend/src/data/mockSchedules.ts: Provides in-memory mock schedule data and CRUD utility functions (get, create, update, delete, toggle) for fan schedules.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context provider and hook, managing login, logout, and identity persistence via DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: A placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks for backend integration; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind, imports DM Sans and DM Mono fonts, and defines a comprehensive set of CSS custom properties for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/EnergyConsumptionPage: Displays energy consumption metrics (current power, daily/monthly kWh, estimated cost) and a per-fan consumption table using mock fan data.
frontend/src/pages/FanControllerDashboar: Main dashboard page showing key fan metrics (total, active, power) and bulk controls for turning all fans on/off and setting speed via a slider.
frontend/src/pages/FanListPage.tsx: Fan management page that lists all fans in a table with summary stats, and supports toggling power and updating fan settings via a modal.
frontend/src/pages/FanSelectionPage.tsx: Provides a filterable fan list with dropdowns for room, status, and power state, displaying matching fans from mock data.
frontend/src/pages/SchedulesPage.tsx: Schedules management page supporting create, edit, delete, and toggle operations on fan automation schedules using mock data and modal/dialog components.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page with persisted (localStorage) preferences for theme, notifications, refresh interval, temperature/power units, and default view.
frontend/src/types/fan.ts: Defines the Fan interface (id, name, room, power state, speed, status, consumption, etc.) and a FanControlState interface.
frontend/src/types/schedule.ts: Defines TypeScript types for fan schedules, including the `ScheduleAction` union type and the `Schedule` interface with fields for timing, days, enabled state, and action.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, custom fonts (DM Sans/Mono), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 3, recording the existing feature to rename the SidebarNav first menu item from 'Fan Controller Dashboard' to 'Dashboard'.
